{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Motorola SB6141 SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Motorola |model = SURFboard SB |submodelappend = |submodel = 6141 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = |type = cable modem |sernum = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETC4830;P5M, TNETC4830ZDWG, 1AAE7ZW; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv6 |cpu1_type_rev = ARMv6TEJ |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6445EMI-10G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9725G6JB-25; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211EG;RTL8211EG, B7E18P1 GB31B; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.2.0;vendor modified; |stockos = Linux;2.6.18;; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DOCSIS 3.0 |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.100.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 612572196199 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00AJHDZSI |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device uses a maximum of 8 downstream and 4 upstream channels.
It [http://www.dslreports.com/forum/remark,27586890 has been remarked as using TNETC4840], but, per the below Wiki link,
at least some 6141s appear to use TNETC4830ZDWG. ==Links of Interest== *[http://sb6141.wikia.com/wiki/SB6141_Wiki Info @ the '''SB6141 Wikia'''] (w/ a link to board shots on imgur) :"SB6141 MAIN BOARD", "SB1557-001 REV: 3", "18-MAY-2011", the '''Motorola''' logo, :"MADE IN TAIWAN", and a date code of '''1146''' is silkscreened on the board shown. :P/Ns used in this entry are per this wiki page. *[http://sourceforge.net/projects/sb6141.arris/ SB6141 OSS Code @ '''SourceForge'''] (linked from above wiki) :the modem apparently was code named '''Komodo''' :tarball contains a modified Linux 2.6.18 kernel as well as U-Boot 1.2.0. :it can probably be safely assumed they are used ===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=336 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ([http://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/buy-or-lease-your-modem/MOTOROLA_SB6141_UserGuide.pdf User Guide] | [http://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/buy-or-lease-your-modem/MOTOROLA_SB6141_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] :[http://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf List of Time Warner approved modems]) [[Category:English Documentation]]
